about_the_game:
Welcome to Foviki Empieria, a heart-pounding multiplayer horror experience set within the harrowing confines of an asylum. Prepare yourself for a relentless pursuit as you and your fellow survivors attempt to escape the clutches of an insidious monster. Will you outwit your pursuer and find freedom, or become another lost soul consumed by the darkness?

In Foviki Empieria, you assume the role of one of four possible survivors trapped in a living nightmare. Armed with nothing but your wits and determination, your only goal is to flee the asylum's twisted halls before the abomination stalking you closes in. Cooperation and resourcefulness are paramount to your survival.

As you navigate the asylum's ominous corridors, blood-soaked chambers, and maze-like passageways, work together with your companions to solve intricate puzzles to try and escape before it's too late. Uncover the secrets shrouded within the asylum's walls, but remember, every discovery draws the relentless monster nearer.

While the survivors cannot fight back, the player controlling the monster must harness their supernatural powers and cunning strategies to eliminate their prey. Embrace the role of the terrifying predator and relentlessly hunt down the desperate survivors, using every advantage to prevent their escape. Unleash fear and chaos upon those who dare to challenge your dominion over the asylum.

Foviki Empieria offers an atmospheric and adrenaline-fueled gaming experience, enveloping you in its dark and haunting ambiance. With stunning visuals and immersive sound design, each step will send shivers down your spine.

  • Memory: 8 GB RAM

short_description: Race against a relentless monster in this heart-pounding multiplayer horror. Play as one of four survivors trapped in an asylum, working together to solve puzzles and search for keys. You can't fight back - only escape. Will you outwit the monster and find freedom, or succumb to the darkness?
